name: pyvmomi-tools
tagline: Additional community developed python packages to help you work with pyvmomi and other closely related VMware API
body:
### Welcome to pyVmomi-tools

The project consists of classes and methods developed to make [community-samples](http://vmware.github.io/pyvmomi-community-samples/) easier to work with. The majority of these tools started life as part of a sample and then were cleaned up, revised, and promoted to a reusable tool. 

### Work In Progress

This project is very much a work in progress. It will be built by your collaboration and ultimately belongs to the Python community that is interested in developing software with VMware APIs.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
